p.k: The average family consists of 2.3 children. But when it comes to the ratio of fathers-per-child, no one has it over little Mary Bennington (Robin Weisman). In fact, Mary has literally cornered the market on paternal pals. Everything being relative, with three doting dads -- Peter (Tom Selleck), Michael (Steve Guttenberg) and Jack (Ted Danson) -- Mary and her mom Sylvia (Nancy Travis) have a perfect, if unconventional, family living arrangement.
